channel.title: Brought my server SkateScape back
channel.description: after a year i've decided to bring my server back online i wish i could get in touch with my old staff. Im currently starting on allstar because it was near blank but im heavily coding it as it has alot of bugs. But im looking for a nice community again, since silabsoft forums went inactive then closed.

item.title: Brought my server SkateScape back
item.dc:creator: @reyx7 reyx7

good ol oldschool allstar.

item.title: Brought my server SkateScape back
item.dc:creator: @mr_dope mr dope
item.description:
@mr_dope wrote:

Allstar is a very fun source and good for beginners. If you’re going to code something, it should probably be something that you enjoy coding and playing. Also, not many people have actually tried to improve Allstar. They just see the new thing and say that everything below it is now shit.

It is also good because there aren’t too many tuts for Czar so you’re basically doing everything yourself.

Read full topic

item.title: Brought my server SkateScape back
item.dc:creator: @Tom Tom
item.description:
@Tom wrote:

OP, put more effort into your thread or I’m going to have to lock it. Possibly include pictures, and a general plan etc?

Read full topic

item.title: Brought my server SkateScape back
item.dc:creator: @Jimmyf Jimmyf
item.description:
@Jimmyf wrote:

[quote=“gravenfire23, post:10, topic:406645”][quote author=Uncalled link=topic=503645.msg3685380#msg3685380 date=1311807331]

[quote author=runewings317 link=topic=503645.msg3685374#msg3685374 date=1311806803]
Rofl. Allstar is the best, the new shit is for leechers who can’t do stuff for themselves (such as add your own models or move to a higher revision).
[/quote]Allstar sucks, I have a Project Insanity and I’ve done quite a bit without leeching.
[/quote]In my opinion every single base that’s outs there can be used and considered ‘good’ what people dont realize is that no one makes an effort when trying they just download change the name and host that’s how its been that’s how its all ways going to be. but there are a select few who choose to make a difference and actually create new things and add unique content. its never going to change so why bother telling people that the base there using sucks or is inefficient because maybe there the ones who are going to change that?

/rant[/quote]

With the amount of effort and the time it takes to turn one of these 2007 servers into something up to par with what we have today, you could have written your own. It’s not worth using these winterlove servers, move along already.

Read full topic
